title: 326: Help! My Holiday’s Suck! w/ Stephen Lovegrove
itunes:title: 326: Help! My Holiday’s Suck! w/ Stephen Lovegrove
description:
The Broads are joined by America’s life coach Stephen Lovegrove who comes bearing Bailey’s and Christmas Sweaters! They chat about what they are all like at parties, social awkwardness post pandemic, “to know you is to love you”, and ADHD. Then they dive into Stephen’s history and incredible journey to becoming a life coach, how he defines success, and the law of repulsion. Stephen then helps The Broads through a conversation covering the upcoming holiday season - social media lies, working through painful memories, high expectations, family boundaries,  loneliness during this time, and much more!

 

STEPHEN LOVEGROVE:

***Check out Stephen’s Magical Holiday Playlist here: https://www.lovegrove.club/stephen-s-magical-holiday-playlist-2021-d04f180e-2c29-44a5-a433-6946aeb6fb21   
***Follow Stephen here: https://www.instagram.com/drlovegrove/

***More information here: http://www.stephenlovegrove.us/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***THE PILL CLUB: Use THEPILLCLUB.COM/CHATTY in order to make the donation!

***PRETTY LITTER: Go to PRETTYLITTER.COM and use code CHATTY to get 20% off your first order!

***STORYWORTH: Go to STORYWORTH.COM/CHATTY to save $10 on your first purchase! 

***DIPSEA: get an extended 30 day free trial at DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY

***HOMEDICS: go to HOMEDICS.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to get a free replacement filter with the purchase of your air purifier… up to a $99 value! 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
